retirementLoanTermsAndConditions:
I declare that I have reviewed all the terms and conditions of granting advances to retirees and beneficiaries of social security, and I undertake to fulfill the obligations incurred by me according to this request, and I authorize the Corporation to deduct the due installments from my pension / share allocated to me, or any funds accruing to me from the Corporation. It is required to grant an advance to the widow Presenting a bill of exchange for the full value of the installment or bills according to the installments due on each of them.
the previous
maternityTermsAndConditions: In the event that the insured person finds a new occupation during the maternity leave period, the maternity leave allowance shall be suspended. â€¢ I declare that I have read all the terms and conditions related to disbursing the insurance benefit. I bear full legal responsibility if I violate any of these terms and conditions and the financial consequences thereof in accordance with the provisions of the law and the related issued legislation.
unemploymentTermsAndConditions: Unemployment allowance will be suspended if it was proved to SSC that the insured has returned to a paid job or has practiced a self-employed commercial business. SSC shall recover all the amounts disbursed illegally after applying specified financial penalty in accordance to the provisions of the applicable legislation. I acknowledge that I have reviewed all the terms and conditions related to the disbursement of the insurance benefit, and I bear full legal responsibility in the event that I violate any of these terms and conditions, and the financial implications that result from that in accordance with the provisions of the law and the legislation issued pursuant thereto.
oneTimeCompensationTermsAndConditions: I acknowledge that I have reviewed all the terms and conditions related to the disbursement of the lump-sum compensation, and I bear full legal responsibility in the event that I violate any of these terms and conditions, and the financial implications of that in accordance with the provisions of the law and the legislation issued pursuant thereto.
developmentProjectsLoanDesc: It is an advance for the development of existing small development projects (individuals, joint ventures, simple partnerships, and self-employed), and the application for it requires the following documents to be attached: (a recent commercial registration + a valid profession license or any valid license to practice the profession)
personalLoanDesc: It is a cash loan to meet personal needs and no evidence is required.
islamicMurabahaLoanDesc: It is an Islamic financing advance for the purposes of purchases such as building materials or furniture. Obtaining this advance requires completing the transaction through the Islamic Bank and bringing an invoice for the value of the purchases. There is no cash receipt with this type of advance.
